ConversionFactor.description: The factor or rate that's used to convert this unit of measurement to the base unit.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when this record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

Name.description: Autogenerated identifier for the unit of measure record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of the unit of measure record.

Sequence.description: The sequence number assigned to the unit of measure.

Status.description: The status of the unit of measure.

Type.description: The type of the unit of measure. For example, weight, distance, period.

UnitCode.description: The code for the unit of measure.

UnitOfMeasureClassId.description: The unit of measure class associated with the unit of measure.
